meanings.definition: Not related to or involving education.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched in class was noneducational.
meanings.sent2: The toy was noneducational, meant only for fun.
meanings.sent3: The noneducational game made the students laugh instead of learn.
meanings.sent4: Her noneducational approach to studying surprised her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The noneducational poster caught everyone's attention with its bright colors.

meanings.definition: Not intended to teach or instruct.
meanings.sent1: The noneducational video was entertaining but didn't provide any new information.
meanings.sent2: The noneducational event was just for enjoyment, not for learning.
meanings.sent3: The noneducational book made the reader smile but didn't offer any lessons.
meanings.sent4: His noneducational speech was full of jokes instead of facts.
meanings.sent5: The noneducational activity was a welcome break from the usual lessons.
